meanings.definition: A chemical element with the symbol Il and atomic number 119.
meanings.sent1: Scientists are studying illinium to understand its properties better.
meanings.sent2: The periodic table includes illinium as one of the elements.
meanings.sent3: When illinium met oxygen, they had a chemical reaction that was quite explosive!
meanings.sent4: Her love for chemistry was as strong as the bond between illinium and its electrons.
meanings.sent5: The glow of illinium under the microscope was mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: A hypothetical element with atomic number 119.
meanings.sent1: In science fiction stories, characters often search for illinium to power their spaceships.
meanings.sent2: The scientists were excited about the possibility of discovering illinium in their experiments.
meanings.sent3: The aliens used illinium to fuel their intergalactic vehicles.
meanings.sent4: The quest for illinium was as elusive as chasing a shooting star.
meanings.sent5: The glow of illinium in the dark laboratory was mysterious and alluring.
